plot: A young disabled amputee boy with a passion for football bets his valuable footballer pictures in the hope he can grab the attention of the girl he loves.
title: Atfal Allah
plot_es: A young disabled amputee boy with a passion for football bets his valuable footballer pictures in the hope he can grab the attention of the girl he loves.
